title: Venus in Pisces
summary: Affection is compassionate, dreamy, and imaginative. Boundaries can blur as empathy heightens. The opportunity is to extend kindness while keeping clarity about needs and limits.

meaning.headline: Connection leans toward empathy, idealism, and creative bonding.

frames.text: Venus in Pisces amplifies sensitivity, romance, and willingness to see the best in others.
Art, music, and spiritual connection can feel nourishing.
Compassionate gestures and forgiveness come more easily.
Love should ignore boundaries or practical realities.

frictions: Idealizing others and missing red flags
opportunities: Engaging in spiritual or reflective activities
Holding space for emotions without fixing

do: Name your needs even while being generous.
Use creative outlets to express affection.
Set gentle boundaries around time and energy.
Clarify what support you can actually provide.
